shoppingCart.model

Class ProductList

  • java.lang.Object
    • shoppingCart.model.ProductList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Product>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Cart, Inventory

    public abstract class ProductList
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<Product>, java.io.Serializable
    A class that manages a list of products. Subject in Observer Pattern
    Author:
    Newman Souza, Seth Moore
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Constructs a ProductList object.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(Product product)
      Adds a copy (including quantity) of the supplied Product to the ProductList.
      void addListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
      Adds a ChangeListener to the ChangeListeners that will be notified whenever this ProductList changes state.
      void clear()
      Removes all the Products from this ProductList.
      void decrement(Product product)
      Decrements, by one, the quantity of a Product that equals the supplied Product.

      Gets the Product in this ProductList that equals the supplied Product, if it exists, else returns null.

      Increments, by one, the quantity of a Product that equals the supplied Product.

      Gets an iterator over the Products in this ProductList.

      Removes a Product that matches supplied Product from the ProductList

    • Method Detail

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Removes all the Products from this ProductList.
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        iterator().hasNext() == false

      • increment

        public void increment(Product product)
        Increments, by one, the quantity of a Product that equals the supplied Product.
        Parameters:
        product - the Product whose matching Product will be incremented.
        Precondition:
        none
        Postcondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product).getQuantity() > 0

      • decrement

        public void decrement(Product product)
        Decrements, by one, the quantity of a Product that equals the supplied Product.
        Parameters:
        product - the Product whose matching Product will be decremented.
        Precondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product) != null, getMatchingProduct(product).getQuantity() > 0
        Postcondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product).getQuantity() >= 0

      • getMatchingProduct

        public Product getMatchingProduct(Product product)
        Gets the Product in this ProductList that equals the supplied Product, if it exists, else returns null.
        Parameters:
        product - the Product whose matching product will be retrieved
        Returns:
        the matching Product, or null if matching product not found

      • add

        public void add(Product product)
        Adds a copy (including quantity) of the supplied Product to the ProductList.
        Parameters:
        product - the Product whose copy will be added to this ProductList
        Precondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product) == null
        Postcondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product).equals(product) == true, getMatchingProduct(product).getQuantity() == product.getQuantity()

      • remove

        public void remove(Product product)
        Removes a Product that matches supplied Product from the ProductList
        Parameters:
        product - whose match will be removed from this ProductList
        Precondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product) != null
        Postcondition:
        getMatchingProduct(product) == null

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<Product> iterator()
        Gets an iterator over the Products in this ProductList.
        Specified by:
        iterator in interface java.lang.Iterable<Product>
        Returns:
        an iterator over the Products in an umodifiableList created from the Products in this ProductList

      • addListener

        public void addListener(javax.swing.event.ChangeListener listener)
        Adds a ChangeListener to the ChangeListeners that will be notified whenever this ProductList changes state.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ChangeListener to add
